content.content: The 26th week of SourceCred trial payouts are here! A hosted instance of SourceCred running on the Maker forum can be found here. For details on opting in, see Opting in to Sourcecred/Wth is SourceCred?. Announcements With the passing of the November Governance Cycle Bundle, the SourceCred Funding Declaration of Intent has been ratified  As detailed in the the SourceCred Pilot Extension post, the SourceCred trial will be extended for an additional six months, during which time details of a technical integration can be worked out. This will include experimenting with the algorithm to determine optimal parameters, creating a process whereby parameters can be determined and ratified by Maker Governance, creating a process whereby Cred scores can be calculated and communicated in a reliable and trust-minimized way, and building an integration that allows tokens to be distributed directly from the protocol.  WARNING:  Cred scores and payouts may see volatility in the coming months as we tweak the algorithm and payout parameters. We still have a lot of work to do before the system is optimized enough to “ossify” , producing predictable payouts. In case you missed it, starting in December (next week), payouts are increasing from 2,500 DAI/week to 5,000 DAI/week  For more details and motivations behind the change, see Increasing SourceCred Payouts. Payouts This week $2,500 worth of DAI was distributed based on Cred scores. Navigate to the DAI Accounts tab  of the Maker instance to see your current DAI balance and total DAI earned. Cred Stats This week saw the amount of Cred generated (a proxy for work) continue its uptrend. This week’s numbers were helped by a number of high-effort posts dropping, as detailed below in the Top Contributions section. New participants continue to trickle in, with two new contributors opting in this week. 51 contributors are now receiving payouts.  image796×561 36.4 KB  Top Contributions Below are the top 10 posts created last week, ranked by Cred generated.     Cred Contribution Author     181 Road to the PSM @hexonaut   174.9 Surplus Auctions UI @adrianleb   150.6 Executive Vote 2020-11-27 - ETH-A DC Increase @Primoz   150.3 REPLY to: [Signal Request] Adjust YFI-A Debt Ceiling @NikKunkel   141 [Signal Request] Adjust YFI-A Debt Ceiling @ultraschuppi   140.8 REPLY to: [Signal Request] Adjust YFI-A Debt Ceiling @Primoz   135.5 The Instant-Run-off Voting Rabbithole @LongForWisdom   129.7 [renBTC] ERC20 Token Smart Contract Technical Assessment @hexonaut   115.9 MIP28c7-SP2: Subproposal for Operational Support Domain Facilitator Onboarding @juan   112.5 [SIXS/RWA-001] Collateral Onboarding Risk Evaluation @SebVentures    Top Contributors Below are the top 10 contributors last week, ranked by Cred generated.     Cred Contributor     219.2 hexonaut   198.7 LongForWisdom   144.4 Primoz   132.7 ElProgreso   115.5 SebVentures   111.9 iammeeoh   109.8 cmooney   92.2 monet-supply   86.4 g-dip   77.9 mrabino1    Top New Contributors Below is a chart of the top new Cred earners in the last six weeks (i.e. their first contribution was made during last six weeks).  image2186×1248 191 KB  If you have any questions or concerns about the scores, data or presentation thereof, please don’t hesitate to ask!
This topic was automatically closed 91 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
